Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: ~ibmmark any update on this ? we have made good progress in scripting and doc but i'm sure we can do a lot more. Anything planned for 1.0 time frame ?

Action.author: markparz
Action.body: This will have to be a future item for sure.

Action.author: rmohta
Action.body: I'm assuming, this would be a web-based component. Something like an onboarding platform. I can help with this one, if no one is working on it.
